name: Apple Music Controls
description: Control Apple Music playback and manage tracks. Includes playback toggles, navigation, and track managements.

commands.name: Toggle Repeat
commands.description: Toggle repeat mode in Apple Music.

args: osascript -e 'tell application "Music" to set song repeat to (if song repeat is off then all else off)'

commands.name: Toggle Shuffle
commands.description: Toggle shuffle mode in Apple Music.

args: osascript -e 'tell application "Music" to set shuffle enabled to not shuffle enabled'

commands.name: Toggle Play or Pause
commands.description: Toggle between playing and pausing the current track.

commands.name: Previous Track
commands.description: Go back to the previous track.

commands.name: Reveal Current Track
commands.description: Reveal the currently playing track inside the Music app.

args: osascript -e 'tell application "Music" to reveal current track'

commands.name: Get Track Info
commands.description: Get information about the currently playing track (name, artist, album).

args: osascript -e 'tell application "Music" to get {name, artist, album} of current track'

commands.name: Remove from Playlist
commands.description: Remove the currently playing track from the current playlist and skip to the next track.

args: osascript -e 'tell application "Music" to delete current track' -e 'tell application "Music" to next track'

commands.name: Dislike Track
commands.description: Mark the currently playing track as loved.

args: osascript -e 'tell application "Music" to set disliked of current track to true'

commands.name: Add to Library
commands.description: Add the currently playing track to your library.

args: osascript -e 'tell application "Music" to add current track to library playlist 1'
